name: Pocus, The Magician: In the Froggy Lair of Scary Monsters
name_original: Pocus, The Magician: In the Froggy Lair of Scary Monsters
description:
Enter/Space: Select, Skip Text

Arrow Keys: Movement

Z: Jumps

X: Flips the world

"In a creepingly dark night, a mysterious house with a weird shape appeard."

After many people go missing, our hero Pocus, The Magician, presents himself to solve this mystery and put an end to the reign of terror of Froggo.

It's a quick, fast-paced platformer with a high difficulty curve.  We hope you'll find it fun enough!

Code, Art and SFX by Zacarias Vieira

Music credits on the game's title screen

meant to be on the #minijam, though submitted after the deadline.

Update 1.1 : Corrected many bugs that appeared in the gameplay.
